Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/object.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/money.h, /include/move_failures.h, /include/obj_parser.h and /include/shops/bank.h

These are functions that everyone can access.

init_dynamic_arg
void init_dynamic_arg(mapping map,

merge_coins
object merge_coins()
This method merges two coin object together. Or attempts to anyway. This will occur whenever a coin object moves.

Returns:
the merged coin object
new_money_object
object new_money_object(mixed number,
                        string type)
This method creates a new money object from the current object. It uses the current objects values to make the money and removes the avlues from the coins.

Parameters:
number - the number of coins to remove
type - the type of coins to remove
Returns:
the new money object

query_money
int query_money(string type)
This method returns the amount of type of money there is in the array.

Parameters:
type - the type of money to check
Returns:
the number of coins of that type

query_number_coins
int query_number_coins()
This method returns the number of coins in the object.

Returns:
the number of coins
